title: Personal Shop
body: Is it possible that the personal shop that rolls around could include ward skins/summoner icons? as someone who has owned every skin in the shop and legacy skins for quite a while and buys new ones on release this shop is kinda useless. tl;dr find a way to take more of my money pls.

replies.body: yeah sorry I meant if it detects nothing like if I open the shop it's completely blank, it should fill it with ward skins or summoner icons instead or maybe even chroma packs

While it might sound like a good idea, how much would it suck for someone who doesn't have many skins to get 3 ward skins (not worth much rp anyway) and the rest are summoner icons (worth even less).

But it would be nice if Riot had an option for a selection of **either** icons and ward skins **or** the normal skin shop.

Or maybe they could just change it to pick up if you own everything and give you ward skins and icons instead. idk
